characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance (mentioned)

characterDescription:
Shauka-daughter-Hasweth is a logicmaster on Roshar of whom Shallan had not heard until Jasnah asked her whether she knew of her. She was one amongst several logicmasters whose works that Jasnah asked of Shallan whether she'd read during her evaluation for wardship.
Later, Shallan bought a thin volume written by Shauka-daughter-Hasweth from the Thaylen book merchant, Artmyrn, who admitted to never having heard any of her works read. He said, "I didn't realize that there were any Shin philosophers of note."
